sentences.en: N: There are three types, intermittent fever , remittent fever and relapsing fever.
sentences.cn: 护士: 有三种.即:间歇热、张热和回归热.

sentences.en: There are three types, intermittent fever, remittent and relapsing fever.
sentences.cn: 有三种.即:间歇热 、 弛张热和回归热.

sentences.en: There are three types, intermittent fever, remittent fever and relapsing fever.
sentences.cn: 护士:有三种.即:间歇热 、 弛张热和回归热.

sentences.en: Two good shots, remittent, drawing wool collects deep feeling.
sentences.cn: 两根棒针,上上下下, 牵引毛线汇成深情.

trans.tran_en: (of a fever or the symptoms of a disease) characterized by periods of diminished severity
